headerPrara: Get your bank connected with qr code.
productOverview1Para: It is one of the payment methods automatically available for all tpay.com Customers. You can pay with one out of 8 bank mobile apps.
productOverview2Para: Choose bank transfer with QR code/ scan and pay/photo transfer from mobile app options. You can also use demo mode to test QR payment.
